name: battleships
description: A battleships game in written in purescript

scripts.bundle: spago bundle-app --main Main --to bundle/app.js && parcel build --no-source-maps assets/index.html assets/main.css
scripts.serve: parallel -- 'yarn run spago bundle-app --main Main --to bundle/app.js -w' 'yarn run parcel serve assets/index.html assets/main.css'
scripts.patch: git tag | sort -rV | head -n1 | awk -F. '{$NF++; OFS="."; print $0}' | xargs -I. git tag -a . -m "New patch version: ." && git push && git push --tags

author: Simon Olander
